column2: (verb) to take possession of an area or land or country, usually by force or without permission
(noun) the highest point or top of something
(verb) to fall down suddleny because of pressure or having no strength or support
(verb) to take control or posession of foreign land, or a group of people, by force
(verb) to invent a plant, system, object.. usually using your intelligence or imagination
(adj) moving into all areas of something and difficult to stop
(adj) existing in a particular place or at a particular time
(verb) to fight against something or someone that is attacking you
(noun) an action that breaks or acts against something, especially a law, agreement, principle, or something that should be treated with respect
